prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the power of storms with a blue and white color scheme.
Imagine an electric-type creature with a cloud-like body and a fierce expression, representing thunder.
Generate a legendary Pokemon with a serpentine body and wings, showcasing the beauty of nature.
Show me a Pokemon that controls lightning, featuring sharp claws and a striking color palette.
Design a powerful Electric/Flying Pokemon with elements resembling thunder and clouds in its appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a storm cloud with electric energy, perfect for a thunderous battle.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that combines the elements of wind and electricity in a unique design.
